sentence.Network_en: The wind inopportunely freshened , rendering the drift of the light craft much more rapid.
sentence.Network_cn: 偏偏风力又增强了,这只轻舟以更大的速度向前漂去.

sentence.Network_en: He arrived inopportunely just as we sat down for dinner.
sentence.Network_cn: 就在我们坐下来准备吃饭的时候,他不合时宜地来了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 失去时机的inopportune失去时机地inopportunely失去意识unconscious

list.abs: The aggressive stand comes at an inopportune moment for the White House ., 进攻姿态发生在白宫一次不合时宜的时刻.
The aggressive stand comes at an inopportune moment for the White House ., 进攻姿态发生在白宫一次不合时宜的时刻.
arrived at a most inopportune hour ;, 在最不合适的时候抵达;
in a recent interview , Ratan Tata the group's chairman , admitted that the company bought JLR at an " inopportune time " .在最近的一次采访中，塔塔集团主席塔塔承认购买路虎选在了“不恰当的时机”。
he explains how the redemption structure of the previous fund cut his flexibility . or how the banks pulled back on liquidity at inopportune time .他会解释说，那只基金的赎回结构如何如何束缚了自己的手脚，或是银行如何如何在不恰当的时候收紧了流动资金。
